alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 03 at 8:58AM CDT until May 04 at 7:19AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. For the Cowleech Fork Sabine River...including Greenville...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, minor out of bank flooding will occur along the river reach. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 14.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
